description:
Shoes as stable as the trails you’re exploring. Follow the flow of the path in a trail shoe that gives each step a natural momentum without sacrificing traction or balance. Grippy lugs keep you upright in muddy and rocky sections, and a waterproof-breathable membrane means feet stay dry even when Mother Nature has other ideas.

  • Nubuck leather and abrasion-resistant fabric upper balances protection and breathability
  • Oboz B-Dry waterproof-breathable membrane keeps rain out and lets sweat escape
  • O-Fit insole has multi-density EVA pods for comfort and cushion
  • Single-density EVA midsoles provide cushioning and support
  • Trail Tread rubber outsole is lightweight, with multi-directional lugs for traction on loose surfaces
name: Oboz Ousel Low B-Dry Light Trail Shoes - Women's
